summary: Everybody is after the money stolen by Hook before he ended up in prison, including the villainous head guard Capt. Stambell.
cast: Jim Brown|Judy Pace|Roland Bob Harris|Paul Harris|Frank DeKova|Ted Cassidy|Frenchia Guizon|John Dennis|Jac Emel|Quinn K. Redeker|Betty Cole|Robert Phillips|Dick Miller|Jan Merlin|Carmen Argenziano|Rudy Challenger|Charles Cyphers|Luther Fear|Herbert Jefferson Jr.|Jerry Jones|Jonathan Kaplan|John Lupton|Lew Sleeman|Clement von Franckenstein
title: A golpes
